title: Global leading kiwi producing countries 2017
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Production volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country China mainland has the highest Production volume in thousand metric tons and United States of America has the lowest Production volume in thousand metric tons.
The difference of Production volume in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 1994.12.

Country China mainland has the highest Production volume in thousand metric tons and United States of America has the lowest Production volume in thousand metric tons.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production volume in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Production volume in thousand metric tons 2024.6 is found at Country China mainland and the minimum is found at United States of America where Country is 30.48.
Second maximum Production volume in thousand metric tons is found at Country Italy.
The difference of Production volume in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 1994.12.
Production volume in thousand metric tons at Country China mainland is 2024.6 , second place is Italy at 541.15, and thirdly is New Zealand at 411.78.
The Country United States of America tends to be 5.09 percent lower than average.
